title: Add message read status tracking
description:
Messages don't track read status, causing them to appear unread across all interfaces.

## Tasks
- Add readAt field to Message type
- Update fetchInbox to include read_at in query
- Update mapRowToMessage to include readAt field
- Create markAsRead() method in MessageManager
- Add MCP tool mark_message_read
- Update CLI/web to call mark_message_read when viewing
- Test read status across interfaces

title: Add SSE transport for remote MCP

## Tasks

- Expose /mcp/sse endpoint for client connections
- Handle /mcp/messages POST endpoint
- Test remote connections
- Update documentation
